If you examine the pic...the right side of the picture is 
damaged...her face was "restored"...note the 1/2 missing eyebrow, 
hair line and indeed much of the right side seems drawn in...I'm not 
an expert but I find the attempt from someone long long ago to 
preserve this image to be fascinating.

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" <secretarytocapt3@h...>
